title: Newest Android Update
body:
It would be cool if you would actually post the update posts on the playstore like other apps do when an update happens.
I noticed that the being shown on for 24 hours bug is gone and there were no patch notes to show it. So yea some way of knowing what changed would be nice. Or am I blind and didnt find it even though you posted it? And if so where o.

Thanks in advance.

replies.body: Yeah, we need to get better about doing that - and we're working on it!  Right after launching we had a few updates that we wanted to get out ASAP.  Moving forward we'll work on giving better info, especially when we fix big things like actually being able to log out appropriately :)
